modName: Armoury of Vernon Roche - Witcher 2 Weapons
summary: Ports of the weapons  - Greatsword, Mace, Falchion and Dagger - of Vernon Roche from The Witcher 2.
descriptionHtml:
Ports of the weapons of Vernon Roche from The Witcher 2.

VISUAL FEATURES:
- Quick (and dirty) retexture for the diffuse of each weapon, going from 256x512 to 512x1024. The stock files are included for those who are prepared to put in the effort to make some better textures. Normal map and environment mask untouched apart from the required alterations to make them fully in line with Skyrim\'s renderer.
- Blood effects and scabbards.

GAMEPLAY FEATURES:
- 4 new craftable, temperable weapons: Roche\'s Greatsword, Roche\'s Falchion, Roche\'s Mace and Roche\'s Dagger.
- Stats roughly equivalent to ebony. The greatsword is a little lighter and quicker, the falchion sits between a one handed sword and a war axe, the mace has a slightly longer reach and the dagger is a little weaker but has a higher critical.
- Require Advanced Armours smithing to craft. Type \"help roche\" (no quotes) into the console to get the IDs for the player.additem command if you don\'t want to go through this.

OPTIONAL FILES:
- Optional file resizes the mace to be in line with Ortog\'s \"A realistic size for a maces replacer\" ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16364/ ).
author: MRRT
